security: Information about individuals is considered sensitive and could potentially lead to privacy concerns or other negative consequences if disclosed inappropriately.
summary: This document is an identification form containing information about Manuel Marti and his sister, Blanca Marti, including their dates of birth, addresses, and file numbers. It also includes results from file checks conducted by various agencies in New York.
summary_one_paragraph: This document, dated September 16, 1968, is an identification form related to the JFK assassination records collection act. It details information on Manuel Marti, including his personal details such as his date and place of birth, his US Army serial number, and relevant file numbers. It also contains identifying data on his sister, Blanca Marti, including her birth date, current and former addresses, and notes from file checks conducted by the Federal Bureau of Investigation and the New York City Police Department in September 1968. The document indicates that the information was furnished to the undersigned agent by the indicated agencies.
title: [ RESTRICTED ] REPORT OF FINDINGS
